summary: This mod adds a detailed and rather unrealistic (and somewhat unlorefriendly) scythe into the world of Skyrim. But who cares about realism when you\'re murdering people with a scythe?
descriptionHtml:
Got problems, advice or ideas? Make a comment! All feedback is very welcome.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22903][img]http://users.metropolia.fi/~tommiw/crap/nikibanner.jpg[/img][/url]
(Click to get to the mod\'s page!)


Updates:
==========
3.0
----

=========================================================================================
3.0 update:
----------------
- Adds an new version of the weapons into the game called Lilith\'s Ancient Sickle that has darker textures, shine and glowing edges. These weapons have slightly higher attack than the normal ones. You will need to upgrade the basic version with of the weapon with 5 daedra hearts to get the ancient version

- Vampire dust removed from crafting ingredients

2.1
----
- A smaller version of the 2-hander has been added
- All the 1-h size variations have now been added to the crafting list
- made 2 dagger versions available. I think some people wanted me to add them 
- made the textures a bit less gleamy





Lilith\'s Sickle 2.0:

- Upgraded textures (normals, diffuse and specular) and lighting properties. Enhances the details on the weapon. Made the textures also a little darker.

- A one-handed version is also now available. Crafted through daedric smithing as well.

- Made some small adjustments to the handle. Looks pretty realistic now. 

- Better bloodmesh. 

[color=red]*If you\'re using the 1.0 version and wish to use 2.0 just download the file and dump its contents into data folder. Merge and overwrite if asked*[/color]

Lilith\'s Sickle - Custom Scythe
----------------------------------------

[youtube]HPXxZznbKac[/youtube]  [youtube]1GErDUzxKpQ[/youtube]


[youtube]apOBzuSOIcQ[/youtube]  [youtube]DGlIcm3urKE[/youtube]

Description:
- - - - - - - -

.....................................................................................................................................
This weapon is part of a Weapon set \"Lilith\'s Tools\"
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -


Lilith\'s Disemboweler - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14906]Link[/url]

Lilith\'s Decapitator - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13416]LInk[/url]

Lilith\'s Reaver -  [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15969]Link[/url]\'

Lilith\'s Sickle - This mod 

Lilith\'s Carver - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22930]Link[/url]

Lilith\'s Obliterator - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23733]Link[/url]

(Lilith\'s Razor - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11908]Link[/url])

(Lilith\'s Cleavers - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12458]Link[/url])


More weapons coming up including dagger and more! Even maybe an armor set when the stars are aligned!
......................................................................................................................................

This mod adds a rather unrealistic (and somewhat unlorefriendly) scythe into the world of Skyrim. But who cares about realism when you\'re murdering people with a scythe?

Since the weapon already has a description, The enchantment info won\'t be showing there. 

skill: Two handed / battleaxe animations (The weapontype is a Battleaxe so all the 2h axe skills will apply )

Stats:

base damage: 28 / 15 crit (25 on daedric battle axe)

reach: 1.35 (1.3 on daedric battleaxe)

weight: 30

speed: 0.7 (same as on daedric battleaxe)

The weapon is crafted through daedric smithing with 7 ebony ingots, 5 daedra hearts, 20 leather strips and 3 vampire dusts. 

1-hander stats:

Dam: 17 (15 on daedric waraxe)

Crit Dam: 9 (7 on daedric waraxe)

reach: 1.05 (1.0 on daedric waraxe)

And the speed is the same as on daedric waraxe.

Crafting ingredients : 3 Vampire dusts, 3 Daedra Hearts, 5 Ebony Ingots and 10 leather Strips
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Installion:
- - - - - -

1.Just dump everything inside the Data folder to  C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data , Merge if asked

2. Check the lilithssickle_axe_1.esp in the launcher 

3. You\'re ready to go :)
 
NMM is currently not supported.


Uninstallion:
- - - - - - - - -

Just remove the files you added.
author: wiikki
